about_the_game:
Step into the past and immerse yourself in Timeless Treasures: The Lost Artifact, a captivating puzzle-adventure game where time travelers explore the wonders of history to uncover priceless artifacts and solve intricate puzzles. Travel through iconic historical settings, from the sands of ancient Egypt to the lush greenery of Mayan civilizations, as you uncover secrets lost to time.

Game Overview

In Timeless Treasures, you’ll journey through beautifully crafted scenes to recover pieces of a mysterious artifact that holds untold power. Each scene is brimming with secrets, interactive puzzles, and lore-rich details that draw you deeper into the past. Explore, uncover, and solve your way through history with the tools of a true adventurer.

Travel Through Time and Shape the Ancient Worlds

Step into the shoes of a time traveler, journeying across iconic civilizations from Ancient Egypt to the lush Mayan jungles. But it’s not just about seeing history—it’s about interacting with it. Use your tools and wits to manipulate time, influence outcomes, and unlock secrets that have remained hidden for centuries. Every action you take leaves a mark on the past, shaping the story as you uncover it.

Dive Into Interactive Worlds Full of Secrets

Each era is a living, breathing world, waiting for you to explore. Solve puzzles, reveal hidden objects, and interact with your surroundings in unexpected ways. From feeding an alligator in the Nile to deciphering ancient glyphs in a jungle temple, every scene offers countless surprises. The environment isn’t just a backdrop—it’s your playground for discovery.

Build Your Own Library of Timeless Lore

Every artifact you find and every mystery you solve uncovers a piece of history. Add these discoveries to your growing library in the Travelers Guild Mission Center, where books and scrolls stack up as visual trophies of your journey. Dive deeper into fascinating facts, legends, and myths tied to each civilization and bring the ancient world to life in your own personal collection.

Meet Tim(e) Turner, Your Quirky Guide Through Time

Who says time travel has to be serious? Tim(e) Turner, your era-hopping radio host, keeps you company on your adventures with era-specific music, helpful hints, and the occasional dad joke. Whether he’s cracking a pun or dropping cryptic clues, Tim(e) Turner brings a lighthearted charm to your journey through the ages. He’s your connection to the past and your quirky guide to history.

If you're excited to embark on this journey through time, we invite you to wishlist Timeless Treasures today and stay updated as the game evolves!

Note About Visual Assets

The screenshots and promotional images shown on this store page are work-in-progress visuals and reflect the artistic direction under consideration for Timeless Treasures. The final game design may feature either a detailed isometric cartoon style or a carefully crafted pixel art approach, both aiming to deliver an immersive and vibrant experience.

name: Timeless Treasures: The Lost Artifact

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10/11 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2100 / AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics (Intel HD Graphics 4000 or equivalent)
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX-compatible
  • Additional Notes: A keyboard and mouse are required.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10/11 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-3570 / AMD Ryzen 3 1200
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated GPU (NVIDIA GTX 660 / AMD Radeon HD 7850 or better)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX-compatible
  • Additional Notes: Works well with standard PC gaming setups.

short_description: Timeless Treasures: The Lost Artifact is a hidden object puzzle-adventure where time travelers explore ancient Egypt, Rome, Greece, and beyond to restore the stability of time. Solve fun puzzles, uncover fascinating lore, and enjoy the quirky radio from the past. This is your chance to make history!
supported_languages:
English*, German, Japanese, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America
*languages with full audio support
